name: mysmobot
0:
”Alexa, ask my smobot temperatures”
”Alexa, ask my smobot grill temp”
”Alexa, ask my smobot to set grill temperature to 250”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my smobot
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hands dirty preparing the rest of your meal? Sitting on the couch and don't know where your phone is? No worries, ask Alexa to tell you the temperature of your SMOBOT. The mySMOBOT Alexa integration gives your SMOBOT a voice and lets you check in on your cook hand free. A SMOBOT Automatic Temperature Controller is required to use this skill.
